item.description:
THIS WILL BE OUR 50th MEETUP!!! Nous aurons un Meetup ce soir. Panera will not be open so we will meet diagonally across the street at the "Whole Foods" store. They have hot and cold foods, tables to sit at, and will be open until 10:00. You can eat, speak French and grocery shop all in one place!! Please remember that this is the Whole Foods store at Bishop's Corner, very near Panera where we usually meet, NOT the one in West Hartford Center.

Merci
Dianne

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: Oui-The night before Thanksgiving!
